name: Suunto 9 Titanium Watch - Unisex
description: With an incredibly strong, light titanium bezel, this watch is ready for ultra races or beating PBs. Intelligent power management tracks battery life to give you enough power for the last km or the next 50. The efficient FusedTrack system combines data with GPS readings (every 1 to 2 minutes) to create GPS-quality tracking without needing constant power. More than 80 activity profiles ready it for any sport and optical heart rate monitor adds a layer of training precision. Pair the Baro 9 with a compatible phone and the Movescount app for whole new feature set. Transfer activities, get notifications, plan routes using heatmaps or share to social channels. Heatmaps display other Movescount users' activities over local maps, making it easier to find great runs, rides, trails or swims. Full activity tracking records steps and calories and quality of your sleep, for a 24/7 picture of your performance and progress.Virtually scratchproof sapphire crystal face and rugged titanium bezel.Valencell’s optical heart rate monitor (version 1.2) provides reliable constant data and allows you to train without a chest strap.Optical heart rate sensors measure changes in blood volume under the skin, and work best when worn snugly, 1 to 3 finger-widths above your wrist bone.Spot check your heart rate to see 10 minutes or 12 hours. During an activity, heart rate data is collected every second.FusedTrack™ uses internal sensors to plot route between GPS points for a data track that mirrors your actual track without draining the battery. Works for running and trail running, with open water swimming in the works.FusedAlti™ combines GPS and barometric data to extrapolate the most accurate altitude possible.FusedSpeed™ combines GPS and accelerometer data to provide a more stable running pace.Intelligent battery profiles change modes to get specific runtimes and features from remaining battery power.Customize your battery profiles for specific activities. Intelligent battery reminders learn your activity patterns and remind you to charge your watch.Dynamic battery monitoring suggests power changes on the fly.Low-battery detection mode switches off everything but the activity timer.Movescount web interface lets you customize modes and display, and lets you compare and race against with other Movescount users and share metrics with coaches or personal trainers.Track PBs by sport and see progress trends for different activities (Bluetooth heart rate belt required for optimal accuracy in water).More than 80 sport modes for cross-training.24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guide you towards a more active lifestyle.Sleep tracking monitors quality and total sleep to calculate recovery and progress.Barometric altimeter tracks ascent, descent and total elevation change.Storm alarm tracks pressure changes and alerts you when it’s time to find shelter.Tilt compensated digital compass helps keep you headed in the right direction.Bluetooth Smart connects to fitness sensors from power meters to footpods, andBluetooth 4.0 phones.Data auto-synchs with phones using Suunto apps, Movescount or Suunto.Smart notifications (emails, texts, alerts and more) via Bluetooth connection to a compatible phone.Free software updates add functionality and improve performance.User-friendly strap changes, thanks to quick-release pins. Fits any 24mm wide strapsFits wrists 13-22cm.In the box: Suunto 9 Baro Titanium, 2 straps, USB cable, quick guide, warranty leaflet.
